title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is an ornate staff, featuring a striking red shaft adorned with intricate patterns and a menacing star-shaped head at its top. This staff radiates an aura of dark power, suggesting its use in arcane rituals and formidable spells. The materials appear to be a blend of sturdy wood and dark metal, symbolizing both elegance and durability. Its design indicates a keen affinity for magic users, particularly those specializing in destruction or chaos. The staff's visual elements hint at a rich lore, making it not just a weapon, but a significant artifact in the game's narrative universe.
